trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to a tracking participant by the run-time tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流程執行個體已中止時由執行階段追蹤基礎結構傳送至追蹤參與者的資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the aborted workflow.
trans-unit.target: 中止的工作流程執行個體 ID。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the root Workflow Activity.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程根活動的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The reason the workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程已中止的原因。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the aborted workflow.
trans-unit.target: 中止的工作流程執行個體 ID。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that defines the order in which tracking records are generated.
trans-unit.target: 定義產生追蹤記錄順序的序列。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the root workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: 根工作流程活動的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The reason the workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程已中止的原因。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the aborted workflow.
trans-unit.target: 中止的工作流程執行個體 ID。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the root workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: 根工作流程活動的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The reason the workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程已中止的原因。

trans-unit.source: The information about the workflow identity.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程識別的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.WorkflowInstanceAbortedRecord"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the aborted workflow.
trans-unit.target: 中止的工作流程執行個體 ID。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that defines the order in which tracking records are generated.
trans-unit.target: 定義產生追蹤記錄順序的序列。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the root workflow activity.
trans-unit.target: 根工作流程活動的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The reason the workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程已中止的原因。

trans-unit.source: The information about the workflow identity.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程識別的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes why the workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述為何中止工作流程的字串。

trans-unit.source: The reason the workflow was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程已中止的原因。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the tracking record data.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含追蹤記錄資料的字串。

trans-unit.source: The tracking record data.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤記錄資料。
